name: Robotexon
description: Robotexon is building the world’s first monetization layer for robotics intelligence. Every robot is trained in simulations before it hits the real world, but 70–80% of that work goes unpaid. Robotexon turns those simulation outputs — control models, datasets, mission profiles — into verifiable, tokenized assets with built-in licensing and lifetime royalties. At the core is XTRON Core™, our proprietary engine that standardizes, secures, and prepares robotics data for on-chain publishing. These assets are sold in the Robotexon Marketplace, already integrated with major Chinese robotics manufacturers, creating demand-side liquidity from day one. Train once, earn forever — every sale, license, and royalty flows through the Robotexon token, building a self-sustaining economy in a $200B+ industry.
